YAML_Warning.title: YAML configuration is deprecated for ICS Calendar
YAML_Warning.description: YAML configuration of ics_calendar is deprecated and will be removed in ics_calendar v5.0.0. Your configuration items have been imported. Please remove them from your configuration.yaml file.

data.prefix: String to prefix all event summaries
data.offset_hours: Number of hours to offset event times

auth_opts.description: Please note this component supports only HTTP Basic Auth and HTTP Digest Auth. More advanced authentication, like OAuth is not supported at this time.
auth_opts.title: Authentication

data.accept_header: Custom Accept header for broken servers

reauth_confirm.description: Authorization failed for calendar. Please re-configured the calendar URL and/or authentication settings.
reauth_confirm.title: Authorization Failure for ICS Calendar

error.empty_name: The calendar name must not be empty.
error.empty_url: The url must not be empty.
error.download_interval_too_small: The download interval must be at least 15.
error.exclude_include_cannot_be_the_same: The exclude and include strings must not be the same
error.exclude_must_be_array: The exclude option must be an array of strings or regular expressions. See https://github.com/franc6/ics_calendar/blob/releases/README.md#filters for more information.
error.include_must_be_array: The include option must be an array of strings or regular expressions. See https://github.com/franc6/ics_calendar/blob/releases/README.md#filters for more information.
